QuoteAction.name: QuoteAction
QuoteAction.description: Indicates the type of sales transaction that’s being quoted; for example, a renewal sale.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly, but didn’t view it.

Name.description: The name given to the quote action.

QuoteId.description: The quote related to this quote action.

SourceAssetId.description: The asset changed by this sales transaction. For example, if the quote action is a quantity amendment, this field contains the ID of the asset that’s amended.

Subtype.description: The subtype of the action on the quote line item.

Type.description: The type of sales transaction that the related quote is for.
